Наша задача - быть рядом, когда возникаю: Our task is to be in touch when legal issues arise, to always help and find a way out of any situation.

Мы отвечаем за свою работу и придерживае: We are responsible for our work and adhere to the traditions and values of classical Russian advocacy.
Коллегия была основана в 1990 году адвок: The Association was founded in 1990 by lawyer Mikhail Barshchevsky and members of the Moscow City Bar Association, becoming the first private law firm in the USSR. Since 1993, the firm's name has been "Barshchevsky & Partners".
Уже более 30 лет Коллегия оказывает юрид: For more than 30 years the Bar has been providing legal assistance and occupies a worthy place among the leading law firms in Russia. Today, Barshchevsky & Partners is a professional team of practicing attorneys and lawyers, including attorneys with years of experience and young ambitious lawyers.
готовность сопереживать проблемам наших: willingness to empathize with the problems of our principals.
Мы специализируемся на защите по уголовн: We specialize in defending criminal cases related to economic crimes, civil law disputes, including corporate, family, inheritance, labor, intellectual property rights, we represent interests in tax disputes and cases of administrative offenses.
Много лет одним из основных наших направ: For many years one of our main areas is comprehensive business support and subscription services, among our regular clients in these areas are companies in the field of air transportation, IT technology, retail, education, energy, car sales and service, health care. In recent years, more and more often private individuals - top managers of large companies, government leaders, politicians and cultural figures apply for subscription services.
Строжайший отбор сотрудников и сочетание: The strictest selection of staff and the combination of scientific and practical competence (members of our Board have published dozens of
) явилось результатом положительного исх: ) resulted in the positive outcome of the vast majority of filings.
Постоянное совершенствование теоретическ: Constant improvement of theoretical and practical knowledge and scientific activities are all integral parts of our employees' lives. Our work is aided by our interaction with many leading academic centers and consultants from among Russia's most prominent legal scholars, as well as retired judges with years of experience. All of this allows us to provide truly highly qualified legal assistance.
Многолетний накопленный практический опы: Many years of accumulated practical experience and scientific potential allow us to find an approach to each client, whether it is commercial or non-commercial organizations, government agencies, public or private persons.
Профессионализм Коллегии регулярно подтв: The Association's professionalism is regularly confirmed by independent Russian and international ratings, such as Pravo-300 in the categories of Criminal Law and Procedure, Arbitration, Dispute Resolution in Courts of General Jurisdiction, Family and Inheritance Law, The Legal 500 for effective cooperation with governmental authorities, etc.
Коллегия адвокатов города Москвы «Барщев: Moscow City Bar Association Barshchevsky & Partners was recognized as company of the year in 2004 and 2014 by the annual business awards «Best in Russia - Companies and Persons of the Year» in the categories «For Contribution to the Development of the Legal Protection of Russian Business» and «Legal Services». Our lawyers are repeatedly recognized by Best Lawyers rating and in the individual rating of recommended lawyers Pravo-300.
Согласно этическим стандартам адвокатско: According to ethical standards of advocacy, our Association does not use advertising in the media.
Вы можете обратиться к нам практически с: You can contact us with almost any legal problem, as our Association is universal and is not limited to the areas presented in this section.
Мы придерживаемся командного подхода, и: We take a team approach and several specialists are usually involved in the consideration of the principal's issue, which allows us to find non-standard solutions even when, at first glance, there is no way out.
Конфликты между работником и работодател: Conflicts between employees and employers are not uncommon nowadays. We represent parties to labor relations in disputes related to disciplinary penalties (including dismissal), with employment reinstatement, on compensation for damages, as well as on protection of trade secrets and personal data, etc.
Большой блок нашей работы посвящен сотру: A large part of our work is devoted to cooperation with organizations on legal support in the field of labor relations, taking into account the industry and corporate particularities, as the adoption of preventive measures will build effective cooperation between the parties to labor relations and minimize the onset of litigation.
Основные направления в области трудового: Main directions in the field of labor law:
устные и письменные консультации по вопр: oral and written consultations on labor law issues;
правовая экспертиза и разработка локальн: legal expertise and development of local normative legal acts (rules of internal labor order, documents on personal data processing, protection of commercial secrets, job descriptions, regulations on structural subdivisions and other documents);
разработка шаблонов трудовых договоров,: development of templates for employment contracts, civil law contracts;
представление интересов работодателей и: representation of employers and employees in court.
Многие клиенты признавались, что жить ст: Many clients confessed that life becomes much easier when you know that in any disputable situation you can turn to «your lawyer». The Association has been providing subscription services to both companies and citizens for many years, and some of our clients have been our subscribers since 1993.
Раньше услугой абонентского сопровождени: Previously, the subscription support service mainly used by large legal entities, but in recent years has increased the number of private clients - top managers of firms, heads of government agencies, political figures and cultural figures, opting for a «family attorney».
Среди наших клиентов компании в сфере ав: Our clients include companies in the airline industry, IT, retail, education, energy, vehicle sales and service, and medicine.
клиенты получают комплексное сопровожден: clients receive comprehensive support for business, in particular, legal clarification in the field of corporate, contractual, labor law, risk assessment of transactions and judicial disputes and other issues.
- такой адвокат уже знаком с доверителем: - such a lawyer is already familiar with the client, their family members or counterparties for many years, accompanied them in making many legally significant decisions. When questions arise, the lawyer can begin to provide quality legal assistance immediately, without wasting time figuring out the situation «from scratch».
Мирное урегулирование конфликта, как пра: Peaceful resolution of a conflict is usually the best way to resolve a dispute. If after a court ruling, it seems unlikely that productive cooperation between the disputing parties can be maintained, the parties can restore their friendship, come to an understanding, build long-term joint plans for business, child-rearing, etc., and discover new mutually beneficial solutions through the mediation procedure.
Адвокаты Коллегии, прошедшие специальное: The attorneys of the Association, who have received special training in the field of mediation, will provide maximum assistance to reconciliation of the disputing parties by preparing and conducting the mediation procedure. The attorneys of the Association may act both as a representative of the disputing party and directly as a mediator - an independent person.
В арбитражных судах и судах общей юрисди: Our attorneys and lawyers have represented in arbitration courts and courts of general jurisdiction for more than 30 years, sometimes literally creating new law practice of a precedential value.
Мы предоставляем комплексную юридическую: We provide integrated legal assistance at all stages of the dispute, from the analysis of the situation and the formation of a legal position, to the end of the execution of the judgment.
обжалование решений, действий и бездейст: appealing against decisions, actions and inaction of state bodies (including the Federal Antimonopoly Service, Customs Service, tax authorities, etc.).
Основные обращения по разрешению споров: The main filing for the resolution of disputes in the courts of general jurisdiction:
защита прав собственности, в том числе в: protection of property rights, including in disputes with state authorities;
взыскание убытков, а также задолженносте: recovery of losses, as well as debts under contracts, including loan agreements;
вопросы, связанные с жилищными правоотно: issues related to housing legal relations;
защита чести, достоинства и деловой репу: protection of honor, dignity and business reputation;
иные дела, связанные с гражданско-правов: other cases related to civil law relations.
Коллегия входит в рейтинг юридических фи: The Association is included in the ranking of law firms Pravo-300 in “Arbitration Disputes” and “Resolution of Disputes in Courts of General Jurisdiction”.
Многие годы наши адвокаты занимают лидир: For many years, our attorneys have occupied a leading position in representing and protecting the interests of clients in criminal cases, mainly in economic matters, both on the side of the defense and on the side of the complainant.
Мы осуществляем защиту прав юридических: We protect the rights of legal entities and citizens, including officials in administrative cases of various categories (in particular, in the field of personal data, intellectual rights, violations of customs rules, in transport, in the field of advertising, etc.).
консультирование по вопросам уголовного: counseling in matters of criminal law;
представление интересов доверителя на вс: representing the interests of the principal at all stages of the criminal process (the construction of a line of defense at various stages, support at the stage of preliminary investigation, participation in the case in the courts of first, appellate and cassation instance);
участие при проведении допросов, обысков: participation in interrogations, searches and other investigative activities;
представление интересов доверителя при р: representing the interests of the principal in a civil action of a criminal case.
Ведение уголовного дела адвокатами Колле: Conducting a criminal case by lawyers of the Association - it is not only the elaboration of a legal position, but also building the right line of conduct of the principal before law enforcement officials, the court and the press, the provision of round-the-clock support to the client and their family, cooperation with expert, evaluation organizations.
анализ материалов и выработка правовой п: analysis of materials and development of a legal position;
обжалование постановлений о привлечении: appealing against decisions to impose administrative liability;
иные услуги, необходимые для защиты прав: other services necessary to protect the rights of the principals.
Что характеризует адвоката по семейным и: What characterizes a family and inheritance lawyer? The presence of sensitivity and a sense of tact. And this is just as important as the legal qualifications. We know how to find an individual approach, because every person and every family is unique.
Если конфликт не удается разрешить путем: If a conflict cannot be resolved through negotiation and a legal dispute is inevitable, our lawyers take on cases of varying complexity, including those involving the division of multi-million dollar assets, shares, stakes in organizations, exclusive rights and much more.
консультации в области семейных отношени: consultations in the area of family relations;
подготовка брачных договоров и соглашени: preparation of marriage contracts and agreements on the division of marital property (including support for notarization of these transactions);
расторжение брака, в том числе заключенн: dissolution of marriage, including marriage concluded outside of Russia and/or with foreign citizens;
споры по разделу имущества супругов (вкл: disputes over the division of marital property (including a large number of assets, stocks, shares in organizations, exclusive rights and much more);
определение места жительства детей;: determination of the place of residence of the children;
определение порядка общения с детьми;: determination of the order of communication with the children;
взыскание алиментов, в том числе в тверд: recovery of alimony, including in a fixed sum of money;
установление отцовства, опекунства, усын: establishment of paternity, guardianship, adoption; deprivation and restoration of parental rights.
консультации по вопросам о праве на насл: advice on the right to inheritance, wills (the existence of several wills, the joint will of spouses, etc.), on the mandatory share in the inheritance and other issues;
комплексное сопровождение на стадии всту: comprehensive support at the stage of entry into the inheritance (representation of the heir at the notary, negotiations with other heirs, etc.);
подготовка соглашений о разделе наследст: preparation of agreements on division of inherited property;
наследственные споры в суде, в том числе: inheritance disputes in court, including contesting a will;
установление факта принятия наследства;: establishment of the fact of acceptance of inheritance;
учреждение наследственного фонда (полное: establishment of an inheritance fund (full support from consultations to the preparation of the charter of the inheritance fund).
Мы чтим традиции адвокатуры, постоянно с: We honor the traditions of the legal profession, constantly improving our theoretical knowledge, which allows us to successfully provide qualified legal assistance for many years. This Section introduces the main members of the Association team.
